books.title: Win at Work and Succeed at Life
books.author: Michael Hyatt and Megan Hyatt Miller
books.tag_line: 5 Principles to Free Yourself from the Cult of Overwork
books.description: Win at Work and Succeed at Life (2021) explores the pitfalls of our long-hours work culture. It outlines how professionals can reclaim their personal lives and achieve a better work-life balance.

books.title: The Work-Life Balance Myth
books.author: David J. McNeff
books.tag_line: Rethinking Your Optimal Balance for Success
books.description: The Work-Life Balance Myth (2021) is a guide to managing stress and creating harmony across the key areas in your life using the Seven-Slice Method. Rather than divide your waking hours between work and life, the Seven-Slice Method recontextualizes life into seven key areas and demonstrates how spending time in each of them every day can help you overcome pressure and find peace.

books.title: Born to Win
books.author: Zig Ziglar with Tom Ziglar
books.description: Born to Win (2012) teaches a simple but effective philosophy for success: you have to first plan and prepare to win, only then can you expect to win. The book demonstrates how to implement this philosophy, from establishing a vision and goals to equipping yourself for success. It also highlights the importance of thinking positively and nurturing your entire being.

books.title: Turning Pro
books.author: Steven Pressfield
books.tag_line: Tap Your Inner Power and Create Your Life's Work
books.description: Turning Pro (2012) sheds a light on why so many aspiring creatives and entrepreneurs fail to make their dreams a reality. It also explains how, by making a conscious decision to pursue your goals and reconfiguring your life, you can finally gain traction and embrace your true calling.

books.title: What Are You Doing with Your Life?
books.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti
books.tag_line: Explore answers to some of life's most difficult questions
books.description: What Are You Doing with Your Life (2001) attempts to answer some of lifeâ€™s most important questions. From considering the role of happiness and personal transformation to the purpose of life itself, it sets out a philosophy to guide you through every stage of your journey.
